item.title: Visualizing home states for Top Chef contestants in R
item.description: Each season of Top Chef is something that I look forward to every year and itâ€™s one of the only shows that my girlfriend and I will make an hour of time for every week to watch. To my delight, this season two of my favorite writers Tom Haberstroh and Kevin Arnovitz have started a weekly podcast called Pack Your Knives to discuss each episode and share their love of Top Chef.
